furryFoster.name: Furry Foster
furryFoster.shortDescription: Allows users to post and search for animals available for adoption or fostering

vrooms.name: V-Rooms
vrooms.shortDescription: Create VR experiences on your browser or VR headset by uploading 360-degree images or videos

farmily.name: Farmily
farmily.shortDescription: Uses the Yelp API to let users find and write reviews for San Diego farmer's market vendors

hangman.name: Mike Tyson's Super Hangman Punchout (React Edition)
hangman.longDescription: A hangman game based on the 1987 Nintendo game. React frontend with Express backend routes to add/remove new words.
